Summary: Shooting light, then stops, drifts to side, turns red and disappears.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside my house on my swingset at about 7:30PM, and just happened to be looking up at the stars. I firmly believe what I saw was a UFO. It not behave like any airplane I've ever seen, nor was it a meteorite. I was facing due East, and the object - bright white at the time - came streaking across the sky directly overhead, going due East. I didn't hear any sound, and it must have been at a high altitude because it was nothing more than the size of an average star in the night sky. At first, I thought it was a meteorite because it was going so fast. However, then it STOPPED and stayed in the same position for about two seconds. Then, the object began to slowly drift to the south as it CHANGED from white to red. The object then faded completely black, and I did not see it again. I would estimate this event to have lasted around 5 seconds. I was not frightened at all by this experience, but simply feel - as I still do - that this was particularly weird and wanted to submit a report on it.
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
